Welcome to Rezepte This application helps you organize your recipes across mobile devices. You can import recipes from websites and books, then customize them to your liking. \nLet\'s get started and configure it to your liking!
Units Rezepte allows you to convert the units in your recipes to suit your preferences. Select the unit format you\'d like to see when creating recipes.
Conversions Rezepte can convert units while you cook. To do this, please select your preferred conversion values.
Finished You have finished setting up the application now you can start your recipe making journey.
Syncing to the cloud Connect to Dropbox to sync recipes between your devices and keep them backed up online. You can also do this later from the home screen. Tap "Connect to Dropbox", authorize, then copy the code provided and paste it into the input box below.
Formatting Customize how recipes appear when editing and viewing them in Rezepte with various formatting options.
Steps In Recipes \nRezepte offers a unique feature: simplified steps. These allow you to combine multiple recipe instructions into a single, comprehensive step.\nFor example, you could merge the "preheat oven" and "put in oven" instructions. This way, when viewing the combined step, you\'ll see all crucial information from both original instructions.\nYou can manually create and edit these steps in creation mode, then link them to instructions after finishing a recipe.\nAlternatively, use the auto-generate feature, which automatically creates and links these steps for you.\nSee an example step below:
Advanced options Here are some of the more advanced options available in the app. If you do not know what you are doing, skip this step.
